attributes.action: Bring back note 5 onto the death certificate
attributes.additional_details: It has been removed. It belongs on the death certificate.
attributes.background: Put note 5 back onto the death certificate

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by 'Note 5' and we can't find any reference to this elsewhere. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as the information you'd like to be included on a death certificate.
